body:
### Ultimate Spirit analysis
I noticed that there are so many poeple who don't know how to analyse the spirit sheets on tournaments. So this software will do that for you. All you have to do is creating a tournament, add all Teams, and fill out the spirit sheet in the software.

You will get a livetime ranking and a full usable analysis you can send to the teams after the tournament.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the Sofftware or you found a issue? Check out the issue tracker at https://github.com/Scyks/UltimateSpirit/issues or contact ronaldmarske@yahoo.com and iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
tagline: A little software for ultimate frisbee spirit sheet analysis
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: UltimateSpirit Analysis
